document.full_text: daimler and rolls-royce announced a joint takeover offer for the diesel engine maker tognum, in a deal valued at 3.2 billion euros.
document.title: rolls-royce and daimler make a joint bid for tognum
lines_and_colors: daimler and rolls-royce announced a joint takeover offer for the diesel engine maker tognum, in a deal valued at 3.2 billion euros.
